title: Episode 871 - Special Guest Tim Kennedy
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by special guest Tim Kennedy to discuss the opening of Tim's new Socratic school Apogee Cedar Park, why they won't be teaching Critical Race Theory, and the challenges behind opening up a private school that is ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by special guest Tim Kennedy to discuss the opening of Tim's new Socratic school Apogee Cedar Park, why they won't be teaching Critical Race Theory, and the challenges behind opening up a private school that is out of the box.  Tim's dad also pops in and lets the world know why his son never let him come to a UFC match and whether or not Tim would ever return to fighting.
